About Me

A little bit about what I do

Your projects are in safe hands


15 years’ experience in IT and a solid history in implementing IT solutions in the Engineering, Logistical, Manufacturing and Public Sectors including FTSE 100 companies. Conceptualised and managed full software development lifecycle projects ranging from £50k to £18 million in budget and managed multiple teams ranging from 3 to 34 FTE. Coming from a technical background and backed by multiple Agile / Project Management certifications and years of experience, I am more than prepared to get the job done.

Certified Scrum Product Owner

Professional Scrum Master

Certified SAFe® Agilist

PRINCE2 Foundation

PRINCE2 Practitioner

PRINCE2 Agile Practioner

Skills

Career Highlights

  • Rolls Royce

    Project Manager / Product Owner

    Derby, UK

    Apr 2018 – Dec 2019


    Led an Engine Health Monitoring software development & migration project to Microsoft Azure Cloud using the Scaled Agile Framework Project as part of a large complex £18m Digital Twin programme involving over 120 FTE.
    Delivered a £2.5m Fleet Planning Tool software development Agile project, from inception through deployment. Managing 30+ developers, testers, data scientists, business analysts, solution architects and Scrum Masters, across 4 Scrum/Kanban teams in UK and India.
    Improving forecasting capacity by 5,000%, enabling scenario modelling capability and improving the UI/UX despite Export Control and compliance challenges.

  • Kuehne + Nagel

    Business Systems Project Manager

    Birmingham, UK

    Apr 2018 – Dec 2019


    Planned Waterfall-led implementations of Information Systems and Business Systems solutions, including SAP S/4HANA (ERP), SAP EWM (Extended Warehouse Management), GTS/ESP, EPod, Duty Manager, Transport Management and other third-party enabled solutions.
    Completed proof of concept, secured successful sign-off and planned full project lifecycle for a £12m implementation of SAP S/4HANA solution.

  • JCB

    IT PROJECT MANAGER

    Rocester, Uttoxeter, UK

    Mar 2017–Oct 2017


    Implemented a Siemens Teamcenter 11 Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) Site consolidation (4-tier solution); secured 20% reduction in engineering process time and 50% reduction in helpdesk calls.
    Eliminated the need to refresh 26 servers worldwide and decommissioned them. Achieved annual saving of £150k+ in capital and £50k+ in operational costs and enabled a central repository for all PLM users avoiding duplication effort.
    Completed an automation project for accounts payable (600k invoices per annum into SAP via OpenText Optical Character Recognition). Cleared the ever-increasing invoice backlog; saved £100k+ OPEX for the business in headcount reduction.

  • Walsall Housing Group (whg)

    IT PROJECT MANAGER

    Walsall, UK

    Mar 2016–Aug 2016


    Co-managed IT Transformation Programme, overseeing implementation of new processes, introducing gated Waterfall approach, standardising internal procedures and increasing efficiency.
    Managed an Automated mobile solution (Xmbrace Dynamic Resource Scheduling and 1st Touch), 2-year project; £150k budget; 8-member project team; joined project in implementation phase and successfully delivered 1 year early by efficiently planning and utilising resources.
    Successfully delivered a new, improved and responsive website, 4-month project; £120k budget; 7-member project team; projected to reduce number of calls to contact centre by 20% in preparation for Universal Credit.

  • Neovia Logistics

    IT Project Manager

    Desford, UK

    Feb 2014–Mar 2015


    Managed the migration team delivering extremely time and cost sensitive solutions in the EMEA region to Daimler, Mercedes, Bombardier, Harley Davidson, Jaguar Land Rover, Caterpillar and Volkswagen.
    Succeeded in implementating a $3M IT supply chain solution in Moscow for Volkswagen despite politically challenging environment, through finding alternative suppliers, IT solutions and effective communication.
    Led migration projects as part of the Cloud Transformation Programme for all software (Such as SAP WMS), Data Storage and Databases from on-premise to Citrix cloud environment within tight timeframes avoiding $3.3m monthly penalty clauses
